Title: ModWatch
Description: A collection of AJAX .Net extender controls that will notify the client if they are leaving the page and there is unsaved data on the form.
HomeWiki:
Welcome to ModWatch.
ModWatch is a collection of AJAX .Net Extender Controls that easily allow a web developer to track changes that are made by the client and notify the client if they attempt to leave the page prior to saving.

The goal of ModWatch is to provide a method of tracking changes on the client in a way that is easy to implement, and minimizes (or eliminates) the need to write custom javascript.

For details about setting up and using the ModWatch framework, download the source code from the Releases tab, and view the WebTest project.
